meanings.definition: Work done on a freelance basis.
meanings.sent1: Freelancing allows flexibility in work schedules.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the independence of freelancing.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat was freelancing as a mouse catcher.
meanings.sent4: The artist's mind was freelancing in a world of creativity.
meanings.sent5: Freelancing opens up opportunities for diverse projects.

meanings.definition: The practice of working as a freelancer.
meanings.sent2: In freelancing, networking is crucial for success.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends decided to try freelancing as a team-building exercise.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were freelancing in the realm of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The concept of freelancing was new to the students.

meanings.sent1: She enjoys freelancing as a graphic designer.
meanings.sent2: Many individuals choose freelancing for its flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to be freelancing its way through the trees.
meanings.sent4: His mind was freelancing on different projects simultaneously.
meanings.sent5: Freelancing allows individuals to pursue their passions.
